description: Transform the ordinary into the extraordinary and experience the ultimate LEGO building experience in the all new The LEGOÂ® Movie Videogame. Step into the world of Emmet, an ordinary, rules-following, perfectly average citizen who is mistakenly identified as the most extraordinary person and the key to saving the world. Players guide him as he is drafted into a fellowship of strangers on an epic quest to stop an evil tyrant, a journey for which Emmet is hopelessly and hilariously underprepared.
name: The LEGO Movie Videogame
